nested_h5py
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Nicholas A. Del Grosso

Overview
--------

Pandas reader and writer from h5py

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install nested_h5py


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/neuroneuro15/nested_h5py.git
    $ python setup.py install
